Class RatingCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.w18t11.whoselineisitanyway.model.rating.RatingCollector

  • public final class RatingCollector
extends java.lang.Object
    RatingCollector is designed to hold and manage overall ratings for any particular user
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lucas Thalen, Samuel Dolha
